text: ajealuu sadaqatikum lfqra' almuslimin aladhin la yastatieun alsfr; tlbana llrzq lashtghalhm baljhad fi sabil allh, yznhm man la yerfhm ghyr muhtajin 'iilaa alsdqt; lteffhm ean alswal, taerifuhum belamathm wathar alhajat fyhm, la yas'alun alnaas balkulyat, wa'iin sa'aluu adtrarana lm yulihhu fi alswal. wama tunfiquu min maal fi sabil allah fala yakhfaa ealaa allah shay' mnh, wasayajzi ealayh 'awfar aljaza' watmmah yawm alqyamt
